channel.title: When someone logout and other question
channel.description:
[b]First Question:[/b]Ok i got a problem, When someone logout and want to get in my server he cant get online anymore, He gets the message server is offline :s Whats wrong,
[b]Second Questions:[/b] My max players is on 40, But only 12 people Can get on,
Whats wrong?
[b]Thank you, God[/b]

item.title: When someone logout and other question
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

I had the same problem… have you looked in your server.java for max players?
Have you also tried client.java?
then for the connection problem: (also had that)
Try using a 512MB Buffer (or whatever you want).
If you dont want to add it yourself download cheezscape and use that run.bat, it has a 512MB buffer in it.

~System79

Read full topic
item.source: When someone logout and other question
